      • getOrientation

        public processing.core.PVector getOrientation(int deviceId)
        Get orientation values of device.
        Parameters:
        deviceId -
        Returns:
        Orientation as PVector, where 'x' is the 'roll' value, 'y' is the 'pitch' value and 'z' the 'yaw' value.

      • getOrientation

        public processing.core.PVector getOrientation()
        Get orientation values of device.
        Returns:
        Orientation as PVector, where 'x' is the 'roll' value, 'y' is the 'pitch' value and 'z' the 'yaw' value.
